content: 1 rs single_crochet 34 on the top side of the potholder at the corner chain 1 and start working on the next side single_crochet 32 on the left side chain 1 single_crochet 34 on the bottom chain 1 single_crochet 32 on the right side of the potholder chain 1 and join the round with a slip_stitch into the first st 32 sts on top and bottom 34 sts on left and right sides 1 chain at each corner hanging loop chain 1 turn ws chain 14 15 chs in total slip_stitch into the next st of the border to form a loop chain 1 turn rs single_crochet 18 inside the loop you just created fasten_off and weave in all your ends your tapestry crochet coffee beans potholder is ready potholder hear is the color chart pattern 32 24 16 8 1 1 8 16 24 32 34 finish
